reviews.review:
In the first couple of hours of this game you'll find something to hate regardless of your political opinions. Participate in a public stoning of a mixed-race couple, and then murder a whole bunch of cops. Welcome to Columbia!

Honestly, I have no idea what this game was trying to say but the gratuitous violence and shallow, cavalier treatment of serious issues far outweighs the pretty environments and interesting music. If you're reading this in 2022 there are like seven thousand better games you could be playing instead of paying $30 for this dated mess.

GREAT game. After I had beaten it, I honestly didn't know what to do. I just sat there watching the credits roll. It made me pretty emotional and might be one of the greatest video game endings I've ever seen. I played Burial at Sea and that just added to the game. While you SHOULD play the other Bioshock games because they're great as well, I don't think you really need to play them to understand Bioshock Infinite. You'll have to play them to understand Burial at Sea though. I HIGHLY recommend playing this game. I don't think I'll be the same after this game, and that's a good thing. So please play it. It'll be worth it. I promise.

Welcome to Columbia!  Bioshock returns with Infinite's new, but old, spin on the series.  Infinite takes place decades before Rapture and the original Bioshock but, *Spoiler Alert, perhaps there's a connection to the original two.   Infinite is a much lighter, brighter game.  Being located high in the clouds certainly paints a more well lit, open environment which is definitely creates a strong contrast to the originals.  The graphics, even in 2022, are still impressive.  Environments are well laid out with multiple paths.  The world is very well developed and the characters populating it are very entertaining and intriguing.  The only knock I'll give the game is with the ever growing number of 4K+ displays, Bioshocks menus are microscopic being originally designed for 1080p screens - get ready to lean in and read once in a while :P

Gameplay has definitely been sped up making it a more action packed prequel - the rails you travel along throughout the game are especially fast and add to some creative combat.  

For some, these changes could welcomed as the stealth, puzzlers that proceeded it could be seen as tired and overused.  That's where this game might get knocked by fans of the originals.  Gone are the "hacking" of turrets, picking of locks/systems, and upgrades of plasmids.  Yes, Infinite has SALT (aka Plasmids) and weapon upgrades but they're a lot easier to achieve and less of a necessity to survive - additionally, the weapon upgrades do not add any cosmetic changes to the weapons or projectiles.  Infinite allows for "outfit" upgrades that can give you offensive, defensive, or ammo/health perks but they're not as creative as Bioshock 1 & 2's passive systems - always loved equpping "electric skin" and let's the splicers get the first jab to then be electricfied by my passive defense system. One could argue that Infinite, being a prequel, wouldn't have the same level of sophistication as it's an origin story.

Infinite is definitely a new chapter to the Bioshock series which could be considered innovative.  Booker, and Elizabeth are your protagonists.  Booker is the character you play for the main game as well as Burial at Sea Episode One.  Elizabeth is a support character for BI and B@S but becomes your primary character in Episode two which returns you to Rapture and a similar play style to the original.  Both characters are likable and definitely create a really intriguing story that ends well, or does it?   The presence of Elizabeth as an NPC in the first two chapters can cause some people to be skeptical.  An NPC side sounds gimmicky but her presence never hindered gameplay and most certainly drives the story since no one really knows who this mystery girl is.

Overall, Infinite was a good game.  It's not as deep as Bioshock 1 or 2 but a worthy entry to the series.  If you kindly have 15 hrs to commit to the main game and the two episodes, I recommend picking up this title.

挺好的游戏，Windows10玩半个小时会闪退，我是一边闪退一边通关的。

背景音樂好聽  有種讓人置身在巴黎的街頭的感覺  讓人很放鬆
戰鬥部分需要動腦  靈活運用障礙物來進行攻擊
FPS新手的我也能玩得很愉快  還有各種炫砲的異能跟處決
劇情方面無可挑剔  能讓人沉浸其中  一直走下去

我覺得有兩個小缺點 : 
一是沒有自動存檔  玩到一半如果有事情退出
會回到上一個紀錄的存檔點   所以建議玩到有自動存檔的地方再退出
(然後有時候按Shift+Space會卡住不能移動)

二是收集的部分  如果漏掉一個收音機或觀光點
那會很難找  可能會像我一樣需要從頭開始一個一個對

--------------------------------------------------------
在第一次逃離囚禁後  在甲板上跳著舞
如果可以的話  真想跟伊莉莎白永遠待在一起

This is my very first Bioshock game I've ever played and it has blown my mind with the story telling and the amazing action pack adventure. The girl in the blue dress, she is so adorable and absolutely helpful in your adventure. It's an amazing world to explore that takes place up in the clouds and its pretty amazing how unique the place is and the art that has put into this game. Totally worth playing and seeing it yourself.

Muazzam bir sanat tasarımı. İnanılmaz bir serinin en güzeli dediğimiz o nadide oyun. 

Sen dostum, evet sen. Utanma ve gel buraya çünkü oyun olarak sana mükemmel bir deneyim sunmaya hazır bu güzel oyun. Öncelikle hikayesi harika. Ve nasıl desem öyle harika öyle güzel bir apokalitik dünya sunuluyor ki, apışım kalıyorsunuz. Şunu söylemem lazım, oyunu oynarken loruna dikkat edin hikayesini anlamaya çalışın. Zira diğer oyunlarının süpyancı robotlarının aksine burada keyif alıp merak edeceğiniz güzel bir şeyler var. 

Sanırım fazla övdüm hikayeyi. Mekaniklere gelecek olursak kesinlikle kendini oynatıyor. İkinci karekter olarak yanımızda bulunan güzeller güzeli tatlı mı tatlı elizabeth oyunda size her anlamda yardım edecek. Tabi fazlası zarar ;) Onunla ilerlediğiniz çoğu zaman yardımına ihtiyac duyduğunuz bir karakter. Saf fps olarak kalmayıp içine büyü dinamiklerini katmasıyla acayip keyif vermekte.

Peki bu oyunda kötü ne var? 

Öncelikle oyun eski arkadaslar. Teması ve sanat tasarımı sayesinde bu o kadar göze batmasa da bunu kabul ederek oynamalısnız. ikinci olay ise kesinlikle bir yerden sonra büyü ve skillerden bir kaçı dışında diğerlerini kullanmıyorsnuız bile.
Başka bir olay ise yaşayan bu güzelim şehirde gerçekten yaşayan bu şehirde mapler biraz kısıtlı. Şöyle ki alanlar geniş fakat ne kadarı dolu derseniz ara geçişler dediğimiz yerlerde baya boşluk var. Ama dert etmeyin çünkü oyunun size nefes aldırdığı yerlerde ise hikaye ile beraber sizin ilginizi çeken ve sizi sıkıntıdan çıkaran onlarca şeyle karşılaşacaksınız.

Son olarak oyun 49 lira eder mi açıkcası bence eder. Fakat oyun eski olduığu için sanırım 20 lira civarında indirim ile alırsanız sizin için daha tatlı olacaktır.

Canınızı yerim, gözlerinizden öperim. Okuduğunuz için de teşekkür ederim. 

Seviliyorsun Booker DeWitt press to F for respect.
